mountain nation park, histor park alberta, see banff nation park. park manitoba, see ride mountain nation park. rocki mountain nation park iucn categori ii (nation park) view bear lake rocki mountain nation park locat larim / grand / boulder counties, colorado, unit state nearest&#160;c est park grand lake, colorado coordin 40°20′00″n 105°42′32″w﻿ / ﻿40.33333°n 105.70889°w﻿ / 40.33333; -105.70889coordinates: 40°20′00″n 105°42′32″w﻿ / ﻿40.33333°n 105.70889°w﻿ / 40.33333; -105.70889 area 265,761 acr (415.252&#160;sq&#160;mi; 107,550&#160;ha; 1,075.50&#160;km2)[1] establish januari 26, 1915 visitor 3,176,941 (in&#160;2011)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic rocki mountain nation park nation park locat front rang rocki mountains, north-centr region u.s. state colorado. featur majest mountain views, mountain lakes, varieti wildlife, vari climat environments—from wood forest mountain tundra—and easi access back-countri trail campsites. park locat northwest boulder, colorado, includ continent divid headwat colorado river. park five visitor centers. park headquarters, beaver meadow visitor center, nation histor landmark, design frank lloyd wright school architectur taliesin west.[3] park may access three roads: u.s. highway 34, 36, state highway 7. highway 7 enter park less mile, provid access lili lake visitor center close indefinitely. farther south, spur rout 7 lead campground trail head around long peak wild basin. highway 36 enter park east side, termin mile highway 34. highway 34, known trail ridg road park, run town est park east grand lake southwest. road reach elev 12,183 feet (3,713&#160;m), close snow winter. california zephyr serv granbi (near west entranc park) rail denver, cross continent divid moffat tunnel well south park. park' websit suggest granbi appropri rail terminu visitors,[4] although lie sixteen mile park without public transport connections. park surround roosevelt nation forest north east, routt nation forest northwest, arapaho nation forest southwest. content 1 geographi 1.1 ecosystem 1.2 wildlif 1.3 climat 1.4 popular area 2 geolog 3 histori 3.1 earli histori 3.2 lord dunraven 'land grab' 3.3 later histori 4 activ 5 galleri 6 see also 7 note 8 read 9 extern link geography[edit] rocki mountain nation park encompass 265,761 acr (415.25&#160;sq&#160;mi; 1,075.50&#160;km2) land colorado' northern front range. park split continent divide, give eastern western portion park differ character. east side park tend drier, heavili glaciat peak cirques. west side park wetter lush, deep forest dominating.[cit needed] park contain 359 mile (578&#160;km) trails, 150 lakes, 450 mile (720&#160;km) streams. park contain 72 name peak higher 12,000 feet (3,700&#160;m), one fourth park resid tree line. highest point park long peak, rise 14,259 feet (4,346&#160;m; survey 2002 show 14,255 feet (4,345&#160;m))[5] sea level. north side park, mummi rang contain number smaller thirteen peaks, includ hagu peak, mummi mountain, fairchild mountain, ypsilon mountain, mount chiquita. sever small glacier perman snowfield found high mountain cirques, includ andrews, sprague, tyndall, taylor, rowe, mills, moomaw glaciers. ecosystems[edit] view tundra landscap rocki mountain nation park. lowest elev park montan forest grassland. ponderosa pine, prefer drier areas, domin especi eastern side park, higher elev dougla fir tree found. 9,000 feet (2,700&#160;m), montan forest give way subalpin forest. engelmann spruce subalpin fir tree common zone. forest tend moistur montan tend denser. tree line, approxim 11,500 feet (3,500&#160;m), tree disappear vast alpin tundra take over. due harsh wind weather, plant tundra short limit grow seasons. stream creat lush riparian wetland across park. wildlife[edit] rocki mountain nation park home wide varieti wildlife. higher alpin areas, one find yellow-belli marmot pikas. larger mammal inhabit park includ elk, bighorn sheep, black bears, mountain lions, mule deer, moose. fall, visitor often flock park wit elk rut. climate[edit] juli august warmest month park, temperatur commonli reach 80s. summertim thunderstorm sometim appear afternoons, visitor plan stay tree line occur. heavi winter snow begin around mid-october, last april. snow melt away lowest elev park quickly, deep snow found 9,000 feet (2,700&#160;m) winter, caus closur trail ridg fall river road winter earli spring. trail snow time year, snowsho ski becom popular. spring tend wet, altern rain occasion light snow. light snow occur late juli higher regions. west side park typic receiv precipit drier east side.[cit needed] popular areas[edit] long peak seen dream lake trail park domin long peak, visibl mani vantag points, elev 14,259 feet (4,346&#160;m). year thousand peopl attempt scale it. easiest rout keyhol route, howev feasibl regular hiker high summer free snow ice. eight-mil (13&#160;km) one-way climb elev gain 4,850&#160;ft (1,480&#160;m). vast east face, includ area known diamond, home mani classic big wall rock climb routes. leav long peak aliv safe. stone gazebo keyhol format plaqu memori agn vaille, well-known climber 1920s. januari 1925, vaill fell 100&#160;ft (30&#160;m) descend north face. vaill surviv fall minor injuries, unabl walk. climb partner, profession mountain guid walter kiener, went help; rescuer arrived, vaill die fatigu hypothermia. one rescuers, herbert sortland, froze death break hip tri rescu her.[6] bear lake, heart park, popular destin trailhead. lake lie hallett peak continent divide. sever trail start lake, rang easi stroll strenuou hikes. bear lake road open year round, though may close temporarili due bad weather. trail ridg road connect town est park east grand lake west. road reach altitud 12,183 feet (3,713&#160;m), long stretch tree line. pass alpin visitors' center, popular destination, cross continent divid milner pass. numer short interpret trail pullout along road serv educ visitor history, geography, ecolog park. southern area park wild basin, wild remot region. sever trail cross area backpack popular. mummi rang short mountain rang north park. mummi tend gentler forest peak park, though slope rug heavili glaciated, particularli around ypsilon mountain mummi mountain. bridal veil fall scenic point trail access cow creek trailhead, continent divid research center.[7] snow-cap never summer mountain found west side park. south-trend continent divid take brief sharp northward loop, creat interest revers scenario pacif basin east side divid atlant basin west. mountain themselves, result volcan activity, craggi often not, cover deep snow. area saw extens mine park, trail lead past old mine ghost towns. paradis park hidden peak grand lake. rug wild area trail penetr it. geology[edit] map colorado. area rocki mountain nation park dark red. front rang creat laramid orogeny, last three major mountain-build events, occur 70 40&#160;million year ago. tecton activ cenozo era chang ancestr rocki mountain via block uplift, eventu form rocki mountain exist today. geolog make-up rocki mountain nation park also affect deform eros cenozo era. mani sedimentari rock paleozo mesozo era exist basin surround park. history[edit] earli history[edit] peopl visit area rocki mountain nation park least 11,000 years. paleo-indian left trace form stone tools.[8] influenc region limited, however, visit often transitory. nativ american came turn. ute tribe visit west side park, particularli around grand lake. arapaho visit hunt est park region.[cit needed] area park ute territory, use camp hunting, late 1700s. driven continent divid arapaho, came east, continu enjoy area colonist european descent arrived.[8] long expedition, led stephen h. long, long peak named,[9] visit area 1820, though never enter mountains. 1859, hunt expedition, joel est son discov meadow eventu becam est park. move famili 1860 rais cattle. stay 1866, forc long, harsh winters. next years, settler homestead stake claim est park region. tourists, particularli interest climb high peak region, appear time. lord dunraven 'land grab'[edit] section cite sources. pleas help improv section ad citat reliabl sources. unsourc materi may challeng removed. (octob 2014) lord dunraven (1841-1926), irish nobleman, later life. rt. hon. 4th earl dunraven mount-earl, wealthi young anglo-irish peer, regular visitor area late 1872. lord dunraven well known ireland britain journalist. also avid huntsman employ texa jack omohundro guid est park area. dunraven subsequ attempt use part homestead act lay claim vast countri estat surround area later becam rocki mountain nation park. dunraven agent laid claim sever thousand acr area 1874 onwards, intend creat privat game reserv affluent hunters. dunraven' attempt land grab outrag local new settler area. earli 1876 dunraven agent find imposs stop new settler enter vast claim establish farms. u.s. govern colorado territori author unwil fulli endors vast land claims. dunraven abandon vast est park claim late 1870 like visit area last time late 1880s. continu claim, however, estat person privat properti 1907 earl dunraven launch number busi tourism ventur area. late 1870s, establish english lodg hotel near est park. hotel oper 1911, burn down. lord dunraven final sold remain land interest area around 1907 f.o. stanley b.d. sanborn, two local businessmen. stanley later establish stanley hotel near est park. later history[edit] 1880, small mine rush began never summer mountains. mine town lulu citi establish great fanfar promot media, particularli fort collin newspapers. ore mined, however, low grade; 1883 rush went bust, resid move on. satellit town, dutchtown, abandon 1884. eno mills, 14-year-old boy, move est park 1884. explor mountain area wrote mani book articl describ region. later support creation rocki mountain nation park, split time mountain love citi eastern unit states, lobbi legisl creat park. legisl draft jame grafton rogers, denver lawyer avid outdoorsman. mills' origin propos park boundari went wyom way mount evan area, includ area indian peak wilderness. much land favor mining, logging, operations, however, propos park reduc area approxim current park borders. bill pass congress sign presid woodrow wilson januari 26, 1915. formal dedic ceremoni held septemb 4, 1915 horsesho park. park expand years, largest parcel&#160;— never summer range&#160;— ad 1929. 1920 saw boom build lodg road park, culmin construct trail ridg road 1929 1933. civilian conserv corp handl sever build project great depress remnant camp found park today.[cit needed] june 24, 2010, wildfir burn 1,500 acr (6.1&#160;km2) park larim counti near est park. est park fire depart believ lightn may start fire. septemb 2013, park town est park heavili damag signific 500-year rain event. park close visitor septemb 12–19, 2013, road lead park entranc east close sever day sever weeks. one point, way leav town est park via trail ridg road, park' scenic byway lead town grand lake western side continent divide. last impact insid park alluvi fan area, flood waters, rocks, debri wash away park areas, much fall river road.[10] repairs, road reopen juli 2, 2015. activities[edit] visitor park drive famou trail ridg road, scenic road includ fall river road bear lake road. mani visitor hike backpack. park contain network 349 mile (562&#160;km) trail dozen design backcountri camp sites. trail rang easi strenuous. mani rout off-trail hiker must care leav trace passage. horseback ride permit trails. trail close hors traffic allow llama pack animals, smaller size softer feet lower impact trail erosion. rock climb mountain increas recent years.[cit needed] long peak, hallett peak lumpi ridge, among others, famou rock climb areas. mani highest peak technic ice rock rout them, rang short scrambl long multi-pitch climbs. winter, trail cover snow, cross-countri ski snowsho popular. backcountry-styl alpine, alpin tour telemark ski found higher slopes. fish found mani lake stream park. camp allow sever design campgrounds. rocki mountain nation park also place downhil skiing. hidden valley (ski est park) oper 1955 1991 along u.s. 34, five mile (8&#160;km) west est park. area ski local long open ski area.[11] gallery[edit] rocki mountain nation park entranc sign est park, colorado trail ridg road, long peak (left center), pagoda peak (center), chief' head (right center) terra tomah mountain (far right, shadow) fairchild mountain (left), mummi mountain mummi rang ouzel fall hallett peak (left) mount ypsilon (left center), chiquita (center), chapin (right), three southernmost peak mummi rang big thompson river east side park. grand lake see also[edit] ecolog rocki mountain geolog rocki mountain alpin visitor' center beaver meadow visitor center bear lake chasm fall fall river pass grand lake kawuneech valley long peak milner pass mount meeker spragu lake trail ridg road wild basin notes[edit] articl includ list references, sourc remain unclear
